text: The hostess and the waitress were incredibly rude and did everything they could to rush us out .
Food was good not great not worth the wait or another visit
label_text: [('Food', 'good not great not worth the wait or another visit', 'neutral')]

text: Great food and the prices are very reasonable .
not sure why this restaurant would be rated that highly .
I like the somosas , chai , and the chole , but the dhosas and dhal were kinda disappointing .
The food is good , I ca n't lie .
Our server was very helpful and friendly .
My son and his girlfriend both wanted cheeseburgers and they were huge !

Food was very good as well , considering that we tried the budget selection ( though I wish the pork belly that I ordered was roasted a bit longer , so that fat was more of a melt-in-your-mouth experience ) .
The menu is very limited - i think we counted 4 or 5 entrees .
The portions are HUGE , so it might be good to order three things to split ( rather than one appetizer and entree per person ) for two people .
